data.title: American Pop-rock Band OneRepublic Returns to China
data.meta_description: 2 May, Shenzhen, CR Shenzhen Bay Sports Center Arena SHENZHEN, China, March 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Live Nation is thrilled to announce OneRepublic will bring their world tour to Shenzhen for a headlining show in May. The band is set to perform live on 2nd May at CR Shenzhen Bay Sports Center Arena. Tickets to OneRepublic Live in Shenzhen...
data.text:
2 May, Shenzhen, CR Shenzhen Bay Sports Center Arena

-Tickets Public On Sale 9th March 10 am via Damai.cn and Damai ticket hotline 1010-3721

American Express® Card Members Pre-sale

5th March at 10 am through 8th March at 10 am

Live Nation Wechat Pre-sale

8th March at 10 am through 9th March at 10 am

SHENZHEN, China, March 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Live Nation is thrilled to announce OneRepublic will bring their world tour to Shenzhen for a headlining show in May. The band is set to perform live on 2nd May at CR Shenzhen Bay Sports Center Arena.

Tickets to OneRepublic Live in Shenzhen 2018 start from RMB 480 and will go on sale at Damai.cn and via Damai ticket hotline 1010-3721 on March 9th. Card Members of American Express®, the tour's exclusive presale partner, can purchase tickets before the general public beginning on 5th March at 10 am through 8th March at 10am. Live Nation members can also pre purchase tickets on 8th March at 10am through 9th March at 10am, for details, please visit Live Nation WeChat and Weibo.

After putting out their third album Native - a 2013 release that featured the hit singles "If I Lose Myself," "Love Runs Out," "I Lived," and "Counting Stars," OneRepublic spent more than two years traveling the world in a series of sold-out tours. With more than 10 million units of "Counting Stars" sold, the song's video has racked up more than 2 billion hits on YouTube and now stands as one of the site's top 20 most viewed videos of all time.

About OneRepublic

From track to track, OneRepublic - which features lead vocalist Ryan Tedder, bassist Brent Kutzle, guitarists Zach Filkins and Drew Brown, and drummer Eddie Fisher - parallel the extraordinary scope of the album's creation by blending alt-rock, gospel, synth-pop, nu-disco, and folk. With its abundance of sweeping, stadium-ready anthems, Oh My My, their latest album, shapes those eclectic elements into songs built on both masterfully expansive arrangements and bravely intimate lyrics.

Unabashed emotion and indelible melody have always propelled the music of OneRepublic, who released their first full-length Dreaming Out Loud in 2007. That album included the Colorado Springs-bred band's debut single "Apologize" - a Grammy Award-nominated, multi-platinum-selling track that long held the distinction of being the biggest radio airplay hit in the history of Billboard's Mainstream Top 40 chart. OneRepublic next followed Dreaming Out Loud with Waking Up, a 2009 album that produced three singles: "All the Right Moves," "Secrets," and "Good Life."

The release of Native followed in 2013 and featured the hit singles "If I Lose Myself," "Love Runs Out," "I Lived," and "Counting Stars." The latest offering from OneRepublic's spirited foray into video-making, "Kids," was shot in Mexico City in the midst of the band's global travels. Sweetly romantic and undeniably feel-good, the video captures such sites as the Angel of Independence and the Monument to the Revolution all in a stunning single take.

As Oh My My made its debut, OneRepublic set their sights on another journey across the globe. With extensive touring in the future, the band looks forward to bringing even more new music back to the very places where it first came to life.

American Pop-rock Band OneRepublic World Tour Live in Shenzhen

Date: Wednesday, May 2nd, 2018

Time: 19:30

Venue: CR Shenzhen Bay Sports Center Arena

Tickets: RMB 480/680/980/1280

Damai.cn and via Damai ticket hotline 1010-3721

About Live Nation Ltd

Live Nation Entertainment (NYSE: LYV) is the world's leading live entertainment company comprised of four market leaders: Ticketmaster, Live Nation Concerts, Live Nation Media & Sponsorship and Artist Nation Management. Live Nation currently operates across 10 countries and regions in Asia including China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, South Korea, Taiwan and Thailand. For additional information, visit www.livenationentertainment.com.

About American Express

American Express is a global services company, providing customers with access to products, insights and experiences that enrich lives and build business success. Learn more at www.americanexpress.com/gns and americanexpress.com.cn and connect with us on e.weibo.com/amexchina and our WeChat account (ID: AmexChina)

Since 1997, American Express has partnered with a select group of leading banks and financial institutions around the world to issue American Express-branded products and acquire merchants on to the American Express merchant network. By leveraging its partnerships, global infrastructure and the powerful appeal of the brand, American Express has gained even broader reach for its network worldwide.
